The war clouds gather:1935 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 1939:
By the 1930s new and strident forces were on the march, putting increasing pressure on attempts to ensure that the world would not again be devastated by war. HitlerÃ‚Â´s Germany was rearming swiftly and threatening its neighbours; Italy and Japan had embarked on new foreign adventures. The war clouds gather looks at the tidal wave of violence which carried the world into World War II..
   Bonus: Development of the Bomber 1918 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 1939


Blitzkrieg! 1939 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 1940:
Once Germany had invaded Poland in 1939, Britain and France acted to honour their pledge and declared war on Germany. Blitzkrieg shows how German Panzers and Stukas unleashed a new form of warfare which proved devastating, swiftly overrunning Norway, Denmark, France and the Low Countries.
   Bonus: The battle of Tannenberg 1914
